Package be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.view

Class ViewSingleArticleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.view.ViewSingleArticleController
  • public class ViewSingleArticleController
extends javafx.application.Application
    Class ViewSingleArticleController, show what an article looks like when you click on it in the article cell
    See Also:
